title: Keith's White Chicken Chili
directions: Saute onion, celery, and garlic in oil until tender, about 5 minutes. In a large stockpot add chicken, water, bay leaf, chiles, oregano, cumin, dry mustard, basil, Old Bay, Cajun seasoning, chipotle, chicken base, and pickled jalapeno and simmer for 1 1/2 hours. Add the drained beans and heavy cream and simmer for 1 hour, or until the beans are tender. Garnish soup with carrots and sour cream.
This recipe was provided by professional chefs and has been scaled down from a bulk recipe provided by a restaurant.
ingredients: 1 pound chicken breast, cooked and diced
1/3 of a 7-ounce can chipotle in adobo, chopped
